title: Low level games and botting
body:
*********************************************************** 
***Copy and paste from a few (4) reports i just filled out ***

I have over 1.5k games on my main account over about 3-4 years of on and off play (levelling through co-op so as to not ruin proper beginners games) and i must say this was one of the worst experiences so far.

Above the toxicity of other players, stomps, teemo's, bm etc it was honestly appalling to see what this game is becoming.

For me to play a level 7 co-op game at 11pm and have 4 bots on my team is pathetic and you guys need to get your shit together (character limit or i would say more)

*********************************************************** 

*** Ticket i just submitted to support, although i feel it is worth sharing with the community ***

As an experienced player i felt guilty from playing the few normal games i did because it would have made a fairly negative experience for a newer player so i bit the bullet and decided to level in co-op vs ai.

Over the past 5 or so games i have noticed bots in game (on my side) normally not more than 1, very rarely 2 and was annoyed that it was happening as it was very obvious to us in game what was happening.

Then i played a game at off peak hours (11pm), and got 4 bots on my team and i don't want to play co-op ever again, super disappointed that this is happening as i can only imagine the number of 5 bot games that happen and nobody says anything because there are 10 bots in game.

Just needed to vent and hopefully get a reassuring response from you guys (riot) letting me know that things are being done about it (oh god it would be super satisfying to ban them at level 29/as they hit 30 [its like what, 100 normal games for that amount of exp? surely thats enough to gauge whether or not they are a bot, esp with like 50% coo-op loss rate].

Thanks 
Not a bot

replies.body: Yeah almost every Co-OP VS AI game now has at least 1 bot in it.
I'd personally say they have at least 6
The real MVP though for not ruining the lower levelled players games, 10/10 would honour.

Riot know about the issue and are actively tackling it. 
Bot banning is usually done in waves, as it takes a while to sort new players from bots. 

Thanks for doing your part and reporting these players as it makes the process a lot quicker and easier :D
Worse is when they're in ARAM -.-
I went 54-11 as olaf in an aram game, there were 3 bots on each team http://imgur.com/pKin6HO
I wonder if the bots occasionally get a real player on there team?

Hi OffTheGrid,

Thanks for your thoughtful post on the topic. I have played with bots in the past and it sucks, it's basically a waste of time and feels horrible.

To answer, we are aware of the botting problem and have teams both in NA and locally in OCE trying to improve our detection and banning process. We check for and ban bots daily, sometimes in larger batches after a few days, but unfortunately at this point they are required to play some games in order to be detected so the lowest levels will always be affected.

I've banned thousands of bots myself, and while it is satisfying to smack em down when they're just about to hit 30 we try to ban them ASAP so that they affect as few games as possible.

I encourage you to keep reporting bots you meet and tell others to do the same. A simple "Bot" in the end of game report comment goes a long way to help us when combined with our other investigation methods. I'm happy to answer any other questions you have on the topic. (although can't talk detection methods)

Thanks,
Also not a bot

Thanks for the reply man, leaps and bounds better than the reply i got for my ticket (ironically it seemed like a copy-paste answer).

Its super reassuring to know that you guys are really trying, keep doing your thing :)

banning harmless bots
not banning feeder and AFKs
thanks riot

If you're playing on EUW I can't speak to what your local Rioters might be doing. But Feeders and AFKer's are already handled globally by Instant Feedback and Leaverbuster respectively.

In OCE we do perform manual feeder checks and bans from time to time as well, and other regions may be doing the same.
put a captcha lock on every 25 games up to 150 games played, so either they have to spend time sorting it every 25, or just not be bothered
